mcq.statement: Identify the sentence that uses a correct transitional word: She excelled in all her classes, nonetheless, her commitment to excellence was evident in every assignment, She excelled in all her classes, however, her commitment to excellence was evident in every assignment, She excelled in all her classes, despite, her commitment to excellence was evident in every assignment, She excelled in all her classes, in fact, her commitment to excellence was evident in every assignment

options.a: She excelled in all her classes, nonetheless, her commitment to excellence was evident in every assignment
options.b: She excelled in all her classes, however, her commitment to excellence was evident in every assignment
options.c: She excelled in all her classes, in fact, her commitment to excellence was evident in every assignment
